lead_paragraph: Joe Johnson scored a season-high 34 points Friday night and Josh Smith had a career-best 29 to lead the Atlanta Hawks to a 111-102 victory against the host Toronto Raptors.
snippet: Joe Johnson scored a season-high 34 points Friday night and Josh Smith had a career-best 29 to lead the Atlanta Hawks to a 111-102 victory against the host Toronto Raptors.
